name: jCoder - Portable Java Coding
short_description: Utilizing Java Swing, jCoder will be a simple Java code editor that will have syntax highlighting and dot-completion. jCoder will be portable between operating systems (the only system requirement will be the Java Runtime Environment 1.5.x).

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Text Editors :: Integrated Development Environments (IDE)
